name: vk_chovay
description: This table stores detailed information about loan accounts, including account details, loan specifics, and financial metrics.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the loan account.

columns.name: client_no
columns.description: Unique number assigned to the client.

columns.name: branch_no
columns.description: Identifier for the branch managing the loan.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: Code representing the general ledger account.

columns.name: loan_type
columns.description: Category of the loan.

columns.name: loan_sub_type
columns.description: Specific type within the loan category.

columns.name: loan_sub_type_desc
columns.description: Description of the loan subtype.

columns.name: purpose
columns.description: Intended use of the loan funds.

columns.name: purpose_desc
columns.description: Detailed description of the loan's purpose.

columns.name: review_date
columns.description: Date when the loan was last reviewed.

columns.name: auto_rec_gen
columns.description: Indicates if the record was generated automatically.

columns.name: billing_days
columns.description: Number of days used for billing calculations.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Identifier for the user managing the account.

columns.name: verify
columns.description: Indicates if the loan details have been verified.

columns.name: verifier_id
columns.description: Identifier of the user who verified the loan.

columns.name: int_appl_type
columns.description: Type of interest application for the loan.

columns.name: acct_exec
columns.description: Executive responsible for the account.

columns.name: profit_centre
columns.description: Business unit responsible for the loan's profitability.

columns.name: dd_no
columns.description: Number associated with direct debit transactions.

columns.name: dd_loan_rate
columns.description: Interest rate for direct debit loans.

columns.name: base_days
columns.description: Number of days used as a base for calculations.

columns.name: fixed_int_rate
columns.description: Fixed interest rate applied to the loan.

columns.name: roll_date
columns.description: Date when the loan is rolled over.

columns.name: roll_freq
columns.description: Frequency at which the loan is rolled over.

columns.name: roll_day
columns.description: Specific day when the loan is rolled over.

columns.name: int_adj_not_posted
columns.description: Interest adjustments that have not yet been posted.

columns.name: int_adj_posted
columns.description: Interest adjustments that have been posted.

columns.name: od_adj_not_posted
columns.description: Overdraft adjustments that have not yet been posted.

columns.name: od_adj_posted
columns.description: Overdraft adjustments that have been posted.

columns.name: od_past_due
columns.description: Indicates if the overdraft is past due.

columns.name: narrative
columns.description: Narrative description of the loan account.

columns.name: date_applied
columns.description: Date when the loan application was submitted.

columns.name: offer_expiry
columns.description: Date when the loan offer expires.

columns.name: maturity_date
columns.description: Date when the loan matures.

columns.name: signed_date
columns.description: Date when the loan agreement was signed.

columns.name: int_rate
columns.description: Interest rate applied to the loan.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Date when the loan period begins.

columns.name: verify_date
columns.description: Date when the loan details were verified.

columns.name: last_change_date
columns.description: Date when the loan details were last modified.

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: Date when the loan period ends.

columns.name: dd_ccy
columns.description: Currency used for direct debit transactions.

columns.name: dd_date
columns.description: Date of the direct debit transaction.

columns.name: acct_no_dd
columns.description: Account number used for direct debit transactions.

columns.name: dd_amt
columns.description: Amount involved in the direct debit transaction.

columns.name: dd_amt_base
columns.description: Base amount for the direct debit transaction.

columns.name: next_pri_rep_date
columns.description: Date for the next principal repayment.

columns.name: bank_status
columns.description: Current status of the loan with the bank.

columns.name: bank_status_change
columns.description: Date when the bank status was last changed.

columns.name: outstanding
columns.description: Total outstanding amount on the loan.

columns.name: outstanding_base
columns.description: Base amount of the outstanding loan.

columns.name: int_recd_recble
columns.description: Interest that has been received or is receivable.

columns.name: pri_recd_recble
columns.description: Principal that has been received or is receivable.

columns.name: od_recd_recble
columns.description: Overdraft amount that has been received or is receivable.

columns.name: last_int_rep_date
columns.description: Date of the last interest repayment.

columns.name: last_pri_rep_date
columns.description: Date of the last principal repayment.

columns.name: next_int_rep_date
columns.description: Date for the next interest repayment.

columns.name: in_outstanding
columns.description: Amount of interest currently outstanding.

columns.name: late_payment_charges
columns.description: Charges incurred due to late payments.

columns.name: effective_datetime
columns.description: Date and time when the loan terms became effective.

columns.name: pri_outstanding
columns.description: Amount of principal currently outstanding.

columns.name: date
columns.description: General date associated with the record.

columns.name: int_day
columns.description: Day used for interest calculation.

columns.name: int_posted
columns.description: Interest amount that has been posted.

columns.name: od_posted
columns.description: Overdraft amount that has been posted.

columns.name: client_name
columns.description: Name of the client associated with the loan.

columns.name: client_type
columns.description: Type of client (e.g., individual, corporate).

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: Date when the system run was executed.

columns.name: int_outstanding
columns.description: Amount of interest currently outstanding.

columns.name: int_calculated
columns.description: Interest amount that has been calculated.

columns.name: int_income_mtd
columns.description: Interest income accrued month-to-date.

columns.name: int_income_ytd
columns.description: Interest income accrued year-to-date.

columns.name: value_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp indicating the value date.

columns.name: int_past_due
columns.description: Interest amount that is past due.

columns.name: od_outstanding
columns.description: Amount of overdraft currently outstanding.

columns.name: sweep_amount
columns.description: Amount involved in a sweep transaction.

columns.name: pri_past_due
columns.description: Principal amount that is past due.

columns.name: year
columns.description: Year associated with the record.

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month associated with the record.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Day associated with the record.

columns.name: cif_number
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer's information file.
